Frequently Asked Questiosn::
    Is Verge Open Source?:
  • Yes. Verge is an open source project. You can find out github here.

    • How is Verge different than x, y, z anon coin?:
  • Watch this!

    • How can I obtain Verge?:
  • There are a few ways to obtain Verge (XVG) coins. First of all, you can buy them on an exhange. Click here for a list of exchanges where you can purchase Verge. Another way is to hang out/chat in our IRC chatroom where users can tip each other.
    • The Windows wallet is taking a really long time to sync, is there anything I can do to speed it up:
  • Yes. You can download the blockchain here. Then follow the instructions on the screen. When you reopen the wallet after completing the instructions allow the wallet to finish syncing the remaining blocks. This final sync can take up to an hour.

    • When will Verge reach x price?:
  • The markets are unpredictable. Nobody has an answer to this question.

    • How many people are on the Verge team?:
  • Verge has one developer, and a web development team. There are also several contributors on GitHub.
